Lyric:
[00:24.75]Pack it up, pack it in
[00:25.76]Let me begin
[00:27.01]I came to win
[00:27.94]Battle me that's a sin
[00:29.25]I won't tear the sack up
[00:30.56]Punk you'd better back up
[00:31.50]Try and play the role and the whole crew will act up
[00:33.77]Get up, stand up, come on!
[00:35.39]Come on, throw your hands up
[00:36.58]If you've got the feeling jump across the ceiling
[00:38.15]Muggs is a funk fest, someone's talking junk
[00:40.33]Yo, I'll bust em in the eye
[00:41.58]And then I'll take the punks home
[00:42.89]Feel it, funk it
[00:43.90]Amps it are junking
[00:44.89]And I got more rhymes than there's cops that are dunking
[00:47.33]Donuts shop
[00:48.08]House Of Pain
[00:49.33]Sure 'nuff I got props from the kids on the Hill
[00:51.83]Plus my mom and my pops
[00:53.03]I came to get down
[00:54.21]So get out your seats and jump around
[00:56.21]Jump around
[00:57.44]
[01:02.81]Jump up Jump up and get down.
[01:05.17]Jump
[01:05.98]
[01:14.53]I'll serve your ass like John MacEnroe
[01:16.21]If your steps up, I'm smacking the ho
[01:18.46]Word to your moms I came to drop bombs
[01:20.83]I got more rhymes than the bible's got psalms
[01:23.02]And just like the Prodigal Son I've returned
[01:25.27]Anyone stepping to me you'll get burned
[01:27.72]Cause I got lyrics and you ain't got none
[01:29.72]So if you come to battle bring a shotgun
[01:31.97]But if you do you're a fool, cause I duel to the death
[01:34.49]Try and step to me you'll take your last breath
[01:37.34]
[01:39.17]Cause when I shoot ta give, I shoot to kill
[01:44.29]
[02:12.73]I'm the cream of the crop, I rise to the top
[02:14.93]I never eat a pig cause a pig is a cop
[02:17.04]Or better yet a terminator
[02:18.11]Like Arnold Schwarzenegger
[02:18.79]Try'n to play me out like as if my name was Sega
[02:21.73]But I ain't going out like no punk bitch
[02:23.86]Get used to one style and you know I might switch
[02:26.22]It up up and around, then buck buck you down
[02:28.23]Put out your head then you wake up in the Dawn of the Dead
[02:30.91]I'm coming to get ya, coming to get ya
[02:32.78]Spitting out lyrics homie I'll wet ya
[02:35.26]
[02:39.68]Jump
[03:08.07]Yo, this is dedicated
[03:10.44]To Joe, da flava, Dakota
